name: Witch Sisters' Sugary Dreams
description:
Witch Sisters' Sugary Dreams

A game inspired by classic arcade titles in which you take control of sisters Keet & Kat to recover the candy stolen by the evil Fersu.

Features:

🍬 Absorb enemies into your spells and form combos to gain incredible amounts of candy!
🍭 40-ish levels, including a boss fight and multiple kinds of enemies!
🍫 Play with a friend in local co-op!
🍰 Compete to get the highest score!
🍩 Gamepad support and input mapping!
🔊 BEEPS and BOOPS!
🎃 And MORE! (though not much, it's a small game)

⭐️ Download includes an instruction manual ⭐️

Default Controls: Player 1

1 - insert coin
e - start
wasd - move player/spell
f - cast spell
g - run

Player 2

2 - insert coin
Enter - start
Arrows - move player/spell
k - cast spell
j - run

Notes:

The game starts on windowed mode. Press F11 to switch to fullscreen or scale the window to your liking. Press F1 for options. Read the manual for further information.
I encourage anyone who has intentions of donating to play the game before doing so to see if it's to their liking.

Update: Mac build doesn't seem to be running right now. Will make a new one when I have the time. For now, I'm unlisting it.
Game works on macOS Mojave, but not Catalina.
